s: June 13, 2022 - Every flavor tastes amazing, but my favorite candies are the coke, Ramune (it says Lamune), apple, and melon. Heads up—apple tastes so unreal compared to its artificial counterpart. For the price I bought this, and the quantity, this is totally the best deal out on Amazon!
